title: Food Systems Summit 2024
summary: Annual gathering of food systems stakeholders
description: Join us for our annual summit bringing together researchers, practitioners, policymakers, and community leaders to discuss the future of sustainable food systems. This year's theme focuses on digital transformation in agriculture.

title: Workshop: Data-Driven Agriculture
summary: Hands-on training on using data tools for farming
description: This interactive workshop teaches farmers and agricultural extension workers how to use digital tools to improve crop yields and make informed decisions. No prior technical experience required.

title: Webinar Series: Climate Resilience
summary: Monthly discussions on climate adaptation strategies
description: Monthly webinars featuring experts discussing strategies for building climate-resilient food systems. Topics include drought-resistant crops, water management, and adaptive farming practices.
